attributes.action: intervene and block any film deal or book deal that the Parents of Madeleine Mccann are trying to broker in connection with their daughters disappearance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These Parents are suspects in their daughters disappearance and murder.
They should not be allowed to broker deals regarding films or book deals to make money allbeit for the find madeleine fund.
This fund should be frozen until such times as they are cleared of any involvement as no one really knows what the fund is being used for 
By doing this the Government would be showing the public that they do not support the idea of leaving young children alone.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
